parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $json['Website name'] }},  

I came across **Design Agency** and was really impressed by your creative work in web design and branding. I especially liked how you combine design, SEO, and digital marketing under one roof â€” thatâ€™s so valuable for modern businesses!  

I recently published a resource that I believe would be a great fit for your audience:  
**[Your Resource Title]** â€” [Short 1-sentence benefit, e.g., â€œA guide to boosting SEO through better UX designâ€].  

I think adding this to one of your relevant blog posts or resource pages could offer your readers extra value.  

Would you be open to taking a quick look? Iâ€™d love to hear your thoughts â€” and of course, Iâ€™m happy to share it on my own channels to help promote the page too.  

Thanks so much for your time and creative work!  

Looking forward to hearing from you.  

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Position, e.g., Digital Marketer | Your Company]  
[Your Website]  
[Your LinkedIn Profile or Contact Info]
parameters.subject: Letâ€™s Collaborate: Valuable Resource for Your Readers
